solution_line_template: Then, {increase_dolls} dolls equals an increase of 25%, and this can be written as x*{percent_increase}=<<{increase_dolls}={increase_dolls}>>{increase_dolls}.
Solving for x we get x={increase_dolls}/{percent_increase}=<<{increase_dolls}/{percent_increase}={original_dolls}>>{original_dolls} dolls in Lucy's original collection.
After the gift of two new dolls, Lucy's collection contains {original_dolls}+{increase_dolls}=<<{original_dolls}+{increase_dolls}={total_dolls}>>{total_dolls} dolls.
